def_cn: (与 rain，blood 等名词连用构成形容词)表示“被…湿透的”
def_en: -soaked combines with nouns such as 'rain' and 'blood' to form adjectives which describe someone or something that is extremely wet or extremely damp because of the thing mentioned.

def_cn: (与sun之类的名词连用构成形容词)表示“充满…的”
def_en: -soaked combines with nouns such as 'sun' to form adjectives which describe places, times, or events that have a lot of the thing mentioned.
